# Accordion Heading 1

# Accordion Heading 3

<!-- Add Custom JavaScript and CSS -->
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  // Wrap each H1 in a div with class 'accordion'
  const headings = document.querySelectorAll("h1");
  headings.forEach(function(heading, index) {
    var content = heading.nextElementSibling;
    if (content) {
      var wrapper = document.createElement("div");
      wrapper.className = "accordion";
      heading.parentNode.insertBefore(wrapper, heading);
      wrapper.appendChild(heading);
      wrapper.appendChild(content);
      
      // Add Bootstrap styles to make heading clickable
      heading.style.cursor = "pointer";
      heading.classList.add("accordion-toggle");
      
      // Create collapse effect and ensure only one is open at a time
      heading.addEventListener("click", function() {
        // Close all other accordion contents
        headings.forEach(function(otherHeading) {
          if (otherHeading !== heading && otherHeading.nextElementSibling) {
            otherHeading.nextElementSibling.classList.add("collapse");
          }
        });
        // Toggle the clicked heading
        content.classList.toggle("collapse");
      });
      
      // Expand the first heading by default
      if (index === 0) {
        content.classList.remove("collapse");
      } else {
        content.classList.add("collapse");
      }
    }
  });
});
</script>

<style>
.accordion .collapse {
  display: none;
}
.accordion .collapse.show {
  display: block;
}
.accordion-toggle {
  background-color: #f8f9fa;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  padding: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}
</style>
